creator.positionName: Researcher at University of Tartu Natural History Museum

metadataProvider.positionName: Researcher at University of Tartu Natural History Museum

abstract.para: Reference-based taxon occurrences hosted by PlutoF platform. Occurrence records are based on digitising literature with mentioning of species (incl. reference, taxon name, time and place) occurring (mostly) in Estonia. These reference-based occurrence records are used for compiling Estonian Species Registry available at https://elurikkus.ut.ee.

intellectualRights.para: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License.

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Mostly Estonia, but also a number of other countries (Russian Federation, Ukraine, Latvia, Finland, Sweden, Norway, etc.)

contact.positionName: Researcher at University of Tartu Natural History Museum

gbif.citation: Abarenkov K. PlutoF platform reference-based occurrences. PlutoF. Occurrence dataset https://doi.org/10.15468/e15jve accessed via GBIF.org on 2022-02-08.
